{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17637v1", "title": "On the negative band number", "summary": "We study the negative band number of braids, knots, and links using Birman,
Ko, and Lee's left-canonical form of a braid. As applications, we characterize
up to conjugacy strongly quasipositive braids and almost strongly quasipositive
braids.", "main_category": "math.GT", "categories": "math.GT", "published": "2025-04-24T15:08:44Z"}
